Users can now optimize their inventory and reduce waste. Problem - Visually humans can’t determine the condition of perishable products and for Supply Chain managers decisions must be made on huge volumes of products at high velocity.  Without our technology perishables are shipped or stored with mismatched timing, the perishables quickly lose value, become unsellable and waste is the result. Unlike our competitors, which only guess what the inventory state is based on inferior mathematical models we measure certain targeted chemical actors to determine the actual freshness state of the product.   We are the first to provide in real-time both the current and projected NPV of perishables inventory at either the order batch level or pallet level based on real data.   Supply Chain Managers get direct feedback on the current value of their inventory, not a “guess”. In the home our products work inside of refrigerators, measuring stored foods remaining nutrition value so people can make better choices of when to best consume their foods based on its actual measured state. Also, our system alarms if Microbial Contamination is detected. Value Proposition: Making the products' Current Value and Rate of Depreciation visible, we literally take money from the trash and put it back in our customers' pockets.  Business Model: Make Freshness Sensors cheap enough to give away and sell freshness IaaS NPV analysis. Without FreshSurety technology only a very low confidence level <10%, (meaningless) quality inspection plans are possible. We put our skills to work to create a new food freshness system that doesn’t require a degree in chemistry to use.
